txt.en:
'I take it things are back to normal at Barad Rill?

'It is good to see the lighthouse be a guiding light for Gondor once more....

'As I was saying, supplies to this camp from the lumber mills in Ringlo Vale have stopped. We have not yet heard word of why. Their lumber is vital to our efforts here. Many of my people have not yet returned, and I fear the worst.

'Perhaps you could shed some light in this dark hour?'
Raithir has told you that Dervorin should be able to help as Lord of the Vale.\n\nDervorin can be found in Ethring.

'Who are you?

'[placeholder]?

'Oh, you must be from Parth Rest looking for the lumber.

'Look, I know nothing. But I would look for Dervorin. As Lord of the Vale, he should be able to help you with your inquiry.'
Herion is worried that the lumber supply from Ethring in Ringlo Vale has been disturbed.
'Another has come looking for their lumber I presume?\n\n'Wait, is that you, [placeholder]?'
Herion has asked you to investigate the missing lumber supplies from Ethring.\n\nEthring can be found in Ringlo Vale to the north.
